description:
Try Gokivo free for the first 30 days, and then get it for only $3.99 per month or $19.99 per year.
Gokivo is the only app you will need to search for restaurants and their reviews, to find both the theaters and the movie times, find real-time gas prices, see traffic conditions and view weather.  With Gokivo, you have the ability to navigate to any location with our signature GPS navigation.

Features:
Maps
•Seamless mapping and navigation experience supporting tilt and rotate controls.
•Immersive map exploration with content layers for weather, POI’s and traffic incidents for quick viewing.
•Real-time Animated Doppler Weather radar. 
•Pan, zoom and interact with satellite maps.
Navigation:
•Natural voice guidance with live traffic directs you with conversation-style prompts.  
•Visibly recognize enhanced 3D buildings and major landmarks.
•Lane guidance keeps you in the lane you need to be in. 
•Choose your preferred route with two or more optimal options. 
•Automatically get new directions if you miss a turn.
•School zone notifications and customizable speed limit warnings. 
•Traffic is updated every 60 seconds with data from 1.8 billion traffic probes, enabling on-the-spot detours around congestion & incidents.
Enhanced Search
•Get ratings and reviews with Trip Advisor.
•Create custom searches for places to go and things to do that interest you.
•Look up movie theaters near you with listings and show times.
•Find the lowest gas prices in your area.

Extra
•Get directions to a contact right from your phonebook.
•Listen to your favorite music app while continuing to receive audible directions. 
•Support for portrait and landscape mode
•Automatic day and night mode.
•Support for Spanish Language.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
Gokivo has been rethought to deliver a customized experience from search to destination. The immersive map exploration and search capabilities provide a tailored experience. Added features and enhancements include: 
•Ratings and reviews from Trip Advisor.
•Customizable searches and icons saved as your favorites for quick look up or navigation sessions. 
•Weather radar provides animated real-time weather conditions. 
•Map layers allow for weather, POI’s and traffic incidents to all be viewed on the map.
